name: David H. Parramon
personalDescription: I am an extroverted happy geek who loves to work as part of a team, yet self motivated to work independently and enjoys delving into code.

experiences.name: Nerdery
experiences.description: Working for the Nerdery I had the oportunity to be part of a very experienced team as Front End Dev, our client spend a lot of resources mantaining several sites with similar content, our team implement Drupal as a CMT and implemented different features to provide a good user experience.

experiences.name: cxLoyalty
experiences.description: At cxLoyalty, I started as part of the Front End Team working on developing and implementing solutions for the main loyalty integration product, focusing on the look and feel (styling and js code), during my period here I switched to different clients loyalty integrations and groups, such as Chase, Citi or US Bank, following an agile approach.  \n Other focusses: Accessibility, build optimitzation and enhancement, progressive enhancement, general site performance, user analitics and client integration.

experiences.name: Untoo
experiences.description: Collaborations as Freelance. Front-end development & consultant, Layout creation, Code development, Cross-browser & mobile device compatibility assurance.

experiences.name: Grifols
experiences.description: Quality Assurance test developer, creating test cases telecomunication services.\n My task was infrastructures valoration, individual test creation, documentation, creation of walkthrough for future references.

experiences.name: Schneider Electric
experiences.description: Full Stack Developer Server development and creation of a test-environment.

experiences.name: Roche
experiences.description: Quality Assurance Engineer at Roche Diagnostics Validation and testing in a low-error tolerance systems, documentation and error-reporting

experiences.name: Ajuntament de Barcelona
experiences.description: Front-End Web Developer, semantic, cross-browser front-end code, Layout creation and code development, Web maintenance (including VIP web and an important home page)

projects.name: Android QR app
projects.client: UPC - Universitat Politecnica de Catalunya (Catalonia Polytechnics University)
projects.description: Android app, created with the objective to make an extensive use of QR codes, databases and Android devices capabilities.\n Scanning a QR code by the side of a determinate classroom in the university, the phone is able to tell, what class is being told at that moment, what teacher is in it, and what comes next.

projects.name: Stop Neonicotonoids Animation
projects.description: Animation created, designed and developed for a general audience to show the effects of Neonicotinoids (a new kind of pesticide) in the environment.\n Software used: Adobe Illustrator, Adobe Photoshop and Adobe Afterefects.

projects.name: Capella web project
projects.description: In this project I had to create an interactive web App, using Javascript/Jquery/JqueryUI, that allows to sort a list (a number not determined) of Items in another part of the screen and check if that Items are correct.\n It had to be easy to add/change/delete items for someone that doesn't have extensive knowledge of Javascript.

projects.name: Chefella
projects.description: Collaborations as Freelance. Front-end development & consultant, Layout creation, Code development, Cross-browser & mobile device compatibility assurance.

projects.name: NWHSU project
projects.description: This was a rather diferent project, the objective: Create a animation to help students understand how 2 vertebreas moves and how it looks when there is a dislocation on them
